note:
I'm a US-based English expat leftie, living in the beautiful Pacific Northwest. I feel happy when I remember that no billionaires benefit financially from my presence here.

I post fairly often, mostly images, usually with nature-based themes. I regularly boost cool nature, photography, & history posts, and sometimes posts that critique neoliberal & neofascist nonsense.

My other passions are unruly: music, art, coops, poetry, gardening, my gorgeous husband, and our numerous cats.
